## Public Member Functions

### getExplicitSectionGlobal() {#a820356be1c79740facb142ac6eaa9e39}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MCSection &#42; XCoreTargetObjectFile::getExplicitSectionGlobal (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject">GlobalObject</a> &#42; GO, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionkind">SectionKind</a> Kind, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> &amp; TM) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Targets should implement this method to assign a section to globals with an explicit section specfied.

The implementation of this method can assume that GO-&gt;hasSection() is true.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoretargetobjectfile-h/#l00027">27</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoretargetobjectfile-h">XCoreTargetObjectFile.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoretargetobjectfile-cpp/#l00097">97</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoretargetobjectfile-cpp">XCoreTargetObjectFile.cpp</a>.

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Given a constant with the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionkind">SectionKind</a>, return a section that it should be placed in.

Given a mergeable constant with the specified size and relocation information, return a section that it should be placed in.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoretargetobjectfile-h/#l00033">33</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoretargetobjectfile-h">XCoreTargetObjectFile.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoretargetobjectfile-cpp/#l00143">143</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoretargetobjectfile-cpp">XCoreTargetObjectFile.cpp</a>.

### Initialize() {#a2c4f64159bcbdb3eaca20c9bbac48f77}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void XCoreTargetObjectFile::Initialize (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &amp; ctx, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> &amp; TM)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This method must be called before any actual lowering is done.

Initialize - this method must be called before any actual lowering is done.

This specifies the current context for codegen, and gives the lowering implementations a chance to set up their default sections.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoretargetobjectfile-h/#l00025">25</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoretargetobjectfile-h">XCoreTargetObjectFile.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoretargetobjectfile-cpp/#l00020">20</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoretargetobjectfile-cpp">XCoreTargetObjectFile.cpp</a>.
